select r_movie_no as movieNo , m_n_no as madeNatureNo , title as movieTitle , director as directorName , page_per_movie_cnt as pagePerMovieCnt , use_yn as movieUseYnEnum , left(replace(movie_reg_dt, '. select r_movie_no as movieNo , m_n_no as madeNatureNo , title as movieTitle , director as directorName , page_per_movie_cnt as pagePerMovieCnt , use_yn as movieUseYnEnum , left(replace(movie_reg_dt, '.
